last_episode_to_air.name: Champion Is Crowned
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mother-son duo Lance and Diane face off against Andrew Dice Clay and wife Valerie, as they prepare a four-course meal for a panel of six chefs and the former contestants.

name: My Kitchen Rules
overview: The American version of this unscripted cooking series pits celebrity duos against each other as they cook and critique each other’s food, in Hollywood homes. The teams will take turns hosting intimate dinner parties with a menu designed to impress their rival competitors and two professional chef judges.

episodes.name: Brandy & Ray J, Lance Bass Dinner Parties
episodes.overview: The premiere of the culinary series in which celebrity duos critique each other's food at intimate dinner parties. First up: siblings Brandy and Ray J prepare a challenging meal and Lance Bass and his mother, Diane, prepare a southern feast.

episodes.name: Naomi Judd, Brandi Glanville Dinner Parties
episodes.overview: Naomi Judd and husband Larry Strickland host an Italian-themed dinner party and Brandi Glanville and her friend Dean Sheremet, a chef, prepare a difficult entrée.

episodes.name: Andrew Dice Clay Hosts Dinner
episodes.overview: Andrew Dice Clay and wife Valerie Silverstein serve spaghetti and meatballs, but Valerie's forced to pick up the slack when Andrew shows off his famed jackets to the guests. The two lowest-scoring teams take part in a sudden death cook-off.

episodes.name: Brandi vs. Brandy at David Arquette's
episodes.overview: Brandi Glanville and Dean Sheremet, and Brandy and Ray J all create dishes at the same time at David Arquette's home.

episodes.name: Dice vs. Lance at Kelly Osbourne's
episodes.overview: Kelly Osbourne and her friends host the next dinner party; Lance and Diane go head-to-head against Dice and Val in the same kitchen; another team is eliminated.

episodes.name: Leah Remini Gets Artsy
episodes.overview: The final three teams must cook for a crowd of more than 100 people during a showing at an art gallery; actress Leah Remini is a guest judge.

episodes.name: L.A. Rams Tackle the Final 3
episodes.overview: The teams must create tasty tailgate food for the Los Angeles Rams and their fans; Rams players Issac Bruce, Cameron Lynch and Johnny Hekker and Rams cheerleader Andy Riggs help Curtis and Cat make their final decision on which duo to eliminate.

episodes.name: Champion Is Crowned
episodes.overview: Mother-son duo Lance and Diane face off against Andrew Dice Clay and wife Valerie, as they prepare a four-course meal for a panel of six chefs and the former contestants.
